00002 /*
00003  *     xDMS  v1.3  -  Portable DMS archive unpacker  -  Public Domain
00004  *     Written by     Andre Rodrigues de la Rocha  <adlroc@usa.net>
00005  *
00006  *     Makes decoding table for Heavy LZH decompression
00007  *     From  UNIX LHA made by Masaru Oki
00008  *
00009  */
00010 
00011 
00012 #include "cdata.h"
00013 #include "maketbl.h"
00014 
00015 
00016 static SHORT c;
00017 static USHORT n, tblsiz, len, depth, maxdepth, avail;
00018 static USHORT codeword, bit, *tbl, TabErr;
00019 static UCHAR *blen;
00020 
00021 
00022 static USHORT mktbl(void);
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026 USHORT make_table(USHORT nchar, UCHAR bitlen[],USHORT tablebits, USHORT table[]){
00027     n = avail = nchar;
00028     blen = bitlen;
00029     tbl = table;
00030     tblsiz = (USHORT) (1U << tablebits);
00031     bit = (USHORT) (tblsiz / 2);
00032     maxdepth = (USHORT)(tablebits + 1);
00033     depth = len = 1;
00034     c = -1;
00035     codeword = 0;
00036     TabErr = 0;
00037     mktbl();    /* left subtree */
00038     if (TabErr) return TabErr;
00039     mktbl();    /* right subtree */
00040     if (TabErr) return TabErr;
00041     if (codeword != tblsiz) return 5;
00042     return 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 static USHORT mktbl(void){
00048     USHORT i=0;
00049 
00050     if (TabErr) return 0;
00051 
00052     if (len == depth) {
00053         while (++c < n)
00054             if (blen[c] == len) {
00055                 i = codeword;
00056                 codeword += bit;
00057                 if (codeword > tblsiz) {
00058                     TabErr=1;
00059                     return 0;
00060                 }
00061                 while (i < codeword) tbl[i++] = (USHORT)c;
00062                 return (USHORT)c;
00063             }
00064         c = -1;
00065         len++;
00066         bit >>= 1;
00067     }
00068     depth++;
00069     if (depth < maxdepth) {
00070         mktbl();
00071         mktbl();
00072     } else if (depth > 32) {
00073         TabErr = 2;
00074         return 0;
00075     } else {
00076         if ((i = avail++) >= 2 * n - 1) {
00077             TabErr = 3;
00078             return 0;
00079         }
00080         left[i] = mktbl();
00081         right[i] = mktbl();
00082         if (codeword >= tblsiz) {
00083             TabErr = 4;
00084             return 0;
00085         }
00086         if (depth == maxdepth) tbl[codeword++] = i;
00087     }
00088     depth--;
00089     return i;
00090 }
